context.p: This topic describes a use case for creating a flat rate billing program.

note.p: This use case gives an example on how to create a flat rate billing program. You might use this functionality differently, depending on your business case.

context.p: This use case describes how an Agreement Analyst can create a flat rate billing program to achieve and align the specific billing requirements.
In this case, an Agreement analyst or program manager creates flat rate billing programs for an account.
To create a flat rate billing program, please follow the below steps:

li.p: Create an agreement for an account.
Add one or more billing programs to the agreement.
Create a flat rate billing program of a specific sub-type.
Add products or categories or bundles to the program.
Specify one or more qualifications and benefits tiers for the product categories or bundles.
Save the program.Agreement Manager approves the program. After the program is approved, Agreement analyst activates the agreement. Now, the program schedule is generated.

p.p: Billing analyst manages the Invoice Runs.

div.p: Apttus approves the invoice and the approved invoice will be delivered to the customer.
